channel.title: [NEED] RSC npc xp table
channel.description:
Did reines use the same NPC xp table as RSC ? And does anybody have the xp table for rscdv25? by this i mean, how much xp each npc give.
ty for replies.

item.title: [NEED] RSC npc xp table
item.dc:creator: @BuyMyJunk BuyMyJunk
item.description:
@BuyMyJunk wrote:

ok, simple misread, thought you just wanted to know if they were the same

and for xp tables, im almost 100% sure that the exp tables are still the same as rsc was, aswell as rs2 is now so just go here for them
http://www.tip.it/runescape/?page=xp_table.htm

but to know if it is the same i would just rune the rscd server, change the exp back to 1x, go kill a chicken and compare
as for xp gained from npc go here
http://web.archive.org/web/20030828073043/www.tip.it/runescape/index.php3?monster_id=4
notice up in the corner it says experience, 1/4 hits, 3/4 skill
ill assume that is what you want

http://web.archive.org/web/20030605113253/www.tip.it/runescape/index.php3?monster=0 <-- monster database

Read full topic

item.title: [NEED] RSC npc xp table
item.dc:creator: @Lightone Lightone
item.description:
@Lightone wrote:

[quote=“BuyMyJunk, post:4, topic:223631”][quote author=henry link=topic=293770.msg2363424#msg2363424 date=1217787574]
i would go look for some old rsc sites. they might have rsc xp tables.
such as
tip.it/rsc/
who knows what you will find.
[/quote]
tip.it/rsc npc database doesnt work anymore
go to archive.org and enter tip.it and look from there for a page that has the old npc database that works try some time around 2004 2003
as far as i know he did since lvl one in rsc was 83 or 82 exp to gain lvl 2, it is the same in private servers, well most of them, not the ones with the points systems that are different
and as for the npc they are also the same, but some might have been added so the new numbers you might need[/quote]

well that didnt work, couldnt really look thru the sites…
and i know its 83 for 2 str n so on, that doesnt help me much.
still need to know each npc’s xp, cbf to read the rscd formula for all the npcs:P

Read full topic

such as

who knows what you will find.[/quote]
tip.it/rsc npc database doesnt work anymore
go to archive.org and enter tip.it and look from there for a page that has the old npc database that works try some time around 2004 2003
as far as i know he did since lvl one in rsc was 83 or 82 exp to gain lvl 2, it is the same in private servers, well most of them, not the ones with the points systems that are different
and as for the npc they are also the same, but some might have been added so the new numbers you might need
